overview: Vicky, Mandy, and Mass are siblings. One day a saturated Mandy goes out with his best friend and manager Joyce, and his girlfriend Alex, into a beautiful forest. The place was dubbed "Jodoh Forests", because it has a shower that supposedly can seal the match. Who ever bathe in the shower will quickly get a mate. Joyce himself felt finding Alex after performing a bathing ritual in that place.
title: Pacar Hantu Perawan
